name: Khmer (Cambodian) Spell Checker
short_description: This Khmer Spell Checker is licensed under the Lesser General Public License (LGPL) since it uses a Khmer Unicode font licensed under LGPL. This project is created in order to integrate khspell with hunspell which is used by Open Office.
